physical_appearance: "The image shows a newspaper clipping. Above the headlines at the top right hand side of the article, ""Singapore Tiger Standard
title_text: Mr. Appavoo Kandiar recounting his 13-day kidnapping ordeal A set of five newspaper clippings reporting the kidnapping of Mr.Appavoo Kandiar
subject_terms_1: Tuesday September 24 1957 Page 5"" is stated. There are four images of Mr.Appavoo Kandiar in different poses crime contractors newspapers
subject_terms_2: together with accompanying English text at the bottom of each image." Ransom Contractors Kidnapping victims Millionaires Clippings (Books, newspapers, etc.)
